thread.title: Tearful mother pleads for the life of only son who is set to hang
thread.title_full: Tearful mother pleads for the life of only son who is set to hang

title: Tearful mother pleads for the life of only son who is set to hang
text:
Mother to K Datchinamurthy, a Malaysian convicted of drug trafficking in Singapore, is appealing to the Malaysian government to intervene before her only son is executed by hanging."I'm not just asking for my (child), there are other Malaysian prisoners on death row."Our country's prime minister can help, should help, these are the children of this country."I'm Malaysian, I hope my country Malaysia would help me (or) will do something, this is about human lives, said a teary A Letchumi. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
